title: Exploring OKX Web3 Wallet for Aptos
description: Learn about OKX Web3 Wallet, a multi-chain self-custodial wallet that offers seamless integration with the Aptos ecosystem, enabling users to store, send, receive assets and interact with dApps.

tasks.title: Prepare Your Wallet
tasks.description: Add at least 0.05 APT to your wallet to explore OKX Web3 Wallet features

tasks.title: OKX Web3 Wallet Basics
tasks.description: Understanding what OKX Web3 Wallet offers
tasks.question: What type of wallet is OKX Web3 Wallet?

tasks.title: Aptos Integration
tasks.description: Learn about OKX's support for Aptos
tasks.question: How does OKX Web3 Wallet support the Aptos ecosystem?
options: Full integration including APT transfers, NFTs, and dApp connections
tasks.correctAnswer: Full integration including APT transfers, NFTs, and dApp connections

tasks.title: Security Features
tasks.description: Understanding how OKX protects user assets
tasks.question: What security feature is essential in OKX Web3 Wallet?
options: Keeping your seed phrase secure and private
Sharing your private key with friends for backup
Using the same password across all websites
Keeping your wallet always connected to dApps
tasks.correctAnswer: Keeping your seed phrase secure and private

tasks.title: DApp Connection
tasks.description: Learn how to connect to Aptos dApps
tasks.question: How can you connect OKX Web3 Wallet to Aptos dApps?
options: It's not possible to connect to dApps
By sharing your private key with the dApp
Through WalletConnect protocol or direct browser extension connections
Only by copying and pasting your address manually
tasks.correctAnswer: Through WalletConnect protocol or direct browser extension connections

tasks.title: Cross-Chain Capabilities
tasks.question: Besides Aptos, what other blockchains does OKX Web3 Wallet support?
options: Multiple chains including Ethereum, Solana, BNB Chain, and more
tasks.correctAnswer: Multiple chains including Ethereum, Solana, BNB Chain, and more

tasks.title: NFT Support
tasks.description: Learning about NFT features in OKX
tasks.question: How does OKX Web3 Wallet handle Aptos NFTs?
options: It can display and manage Aptos NFTs
Only shows NFT balances but not images
tasks.correctAnswer: It can display and manage Aptos NFTs

tasks.title: Wallet Recovery
tasks.question: How can you recover your OKX Web3 Wallet if you lose access to your device?
options: By using your seed phrase (recovery phrase) to restore the wallet
Only if you have the original device
tasks.correctAnswer: By using your seed phrase (recovery phrase) to restore the wallet
